name: Unruly Polygons (Jam Game)
description:
Made in 48h for the GMTK Game Jam with the theme: "Out Of Control".

Important notes:

The desktop version is highly more optimized than HTML5 version and it also has higher entity limit. HTML5 version also has a few bugs and issues that are not present on the desktop version. For best user experience and performance please use the desktop version. 

How To Play:

Use W, A, S, D or arrow key to move.
Use SPACE or LMB to shoot.
Use your mouse to rotate.

There is also a memory leak when resizing a window. Try not to resize it to many times as it may slow down the performance of the game.
